column1: Thanks to Operation Warp Speed Moderna has produced a promising vaccine faster than ever before.   The vaccine candidate has a 94.5% efficacy rate according to preliminary results. This is a huge step towards defeating COVID-19!

DHEC is offering free covid testing at Coastal Carolina for students and the general public.  Testing will be  available Tuesday Nov. 17 through Friday Nov. 20 and on Sunday Nov. 22 at CCU’s KK parking lot from 9 a.m. until 4 p.m.  https://t.co/tbyO3992Pj

The #PPP has been held hostage for months for a wish list of non-COVID-related priorities.   Today the Senate votes on a relief bill that will provide funding for unemployment benefits safe schools & small biz.   I hope Senate Dems will put struggling Americans before politics. https://t.co/L1AiXSYNyh

ICYMI:  I talked to Dave Priest on @WRNN995 about Covid-19 relief SCOTUS confirmation and legislation to support our police officers.   My wife Wrenzie even joined us this morning!   Be sure to listen below⬇️  https://t.co/f0TUDvzINO
#HAPPENINGNOW  This morning I’m joining @foxandfriends to talk about my experience with Covid-19 and moving forward.   Watch Now on @FoxNews !
#HAPPENINGNOW: @WaysandMeansGOP SRM Subcommittee Hearing on the Consequences of Inaction on COVID Tax Legislation.   Watch Live: https://t.co/pJSsza3ysw

🔴 HAPPENING NOW: The blood and plasma drive is happening now until 5 PM at my Pee Dee office parking lot (1831 West Evans Street).   Did you know one plasma donation can help three coronavirus patients?! https://t.co/nt7xQcSEld

Waccamaw and Pee Dee Regional Councils of Governments both received grants to support coronavirus recovery.  These grants address two Seventh District priorities: relief from the economic crisis brought on by coronavirus and stimulating the economy. https://t.co/xm1wg8vDcM

Republicans’ Covid-19 package would provide relief for families and businesses across America.   But Democrats prefer politics over people.   Pelosi’s Partisan Wish List is dangerous to the American people and will never become law. ⬇️ https://t.co/bNsp47hkTj

During the town hall last night I asked nearly 7000 constituents "Which issue is most important to our country today?" Here are the results: National Security: 11% Job Creation: 7% Law and Order: 37% Infrastructure: 9% Debt and Deficit: 9% Covid-19: 27%   Thanks for joining!☎️
@realDonaldTrump Donate plasma to help fight covid-19! ✅🩸🦠 https://t.co/nlbgyhU8f0

The next coronavirus package should ensure all businesses can open up safely.   My Healthy Workplaces Tax Credit bill is a smart approach to do just that. Americans are ready to get back to work & this will help them do so responsibly.   I’m pleased it was in today’s Senate bill.
ICYMI: I talked with Matt Christian about the Paycheck Protection Program and how our small businesses and tourism have been affected by the coronavirus.   https://t.co/zjoGLi7UTJ
ICYMI: Yesterday I talked with Donovan Harris about the coronavirus response locally and nationally!   https://t.co/JV43dwvKsL

Have you seen the good news?!🚨👏🏻  89% of South Carolinians who have had COVID-19 have recovered from the disease!   Keep social distancing washing your hands and working hard to stay healthy!!   https://t.co/IFtcpdjk6D

On Thursday July 16 I am partnering with the Blood Connection to host a drive to collect blood plasma and antibodies. I encourage you to participate.  I would also love to have all elected officials who tested COVID positive to join me in donating antibodies. (1/3)
The @SBAgov has reopened the Economic Injury Disaster Loan (EIDL) and EIDL Advance program portal to all eligible applicants experiencing economic impacts due to COVID-19.   https://t.co/uREIKdEC1T
Farmers →  Starting today you can apply for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program if you’ve been directly impacted by the coronavirus pandemic.  https://t.co/eFzaTqyo9C

The Main Street Lending Program unveiled earlier this month by the Federal Reserve will now allow larger businesses to participate and it will relax minimum-loan amounts to help more small businesses that have been hit by the coronavirus pandemic.   https://t.co/fAHYSvIkjr

. @realDonaldTrump signed the Paycheck Protection Program and Health Care Enhancement Act that was passed in the House yesterday.   Thanks to this legislation-  ✔️Replenishes PPP funding for our small businesses  ✔️Supports our healthcare providers ✔️Expands coronavirus testing

TODAY- April 23 3:00 PM  The South Carolina Department of Employment and Workforce is hosting a virtual meeting to discuss Unemployment Information and other coronavirus response resources for employers.   Register here: https://t.co/UQPDbAi8Hl

The IRS is hosting a webinar for Main Street Businesses and worker’s on April 23rd at 2 PM.   This will be a chance for you to ask questions directly to the IRS about COVID19 relief and other topics.   Register by clicking below ⬇️  https://t.co/pXgQOstonx

Local swimwear manufacturer Tara Grinna Swim & Resort Wear stepped up to sew new elastic bands on 35000 never used N95 respirators. They were donated to Tidelands Health team members responding to the coronavirus pandemic!  https://t.co/Cc6kOdhno7

Be sure to be on the lookout for a surge of call and email scams about coronavirus and stimulus payments. These scams can lead to tax fraud and identity theft.   See below for tips from the IRS on how to avoid these scams!  https://t.co/yLyDkJjqDQ
My office has created a coronavirus update page for all the resources and information you might be looking for!   To see updates and more visit: https://t.co/eB9KKPY1C7

The greatest severe weather risk for the Grand Strand is between 7:30 to 11:30 a.m. forecasters at NWS Wilmington said.   We have a strong emergency response.  Make sure to stay in touch with loved ones as we battle coronavirus and storms.   https://t.co/SzZE23gaQK
Tidelands Health and the American Red Cross are teaming up to help replenish a blood supply shortage during the coronavirus pandemic!  https://t.co/6mpw1fcouJ
I’ll be on the Dave Priest show this morning at 8:30 to talk about coronavirus response efforts stimulus checks and small business loans. Tune in below!  https://t.co/mHOiqMxVHx

Abott Laboratories has produced a test for coronavirus that delivers results in as little as five minutes.   Abott plans to provide 50000 tests per day starting April 1st. They are small portable and can be used in almost any healthcare setting.   https://t.co/31UDG5U1eT
I co-sponsored this resolution because China needs to be held accountable for their secrecy and lack of transparency in the handling of COVID-19. https://t.co/S201g8zy7O
#Covid19 and the flu can show very similar symptoms.   However they are caused by very different viruses.   To learn more visit: https://t.co/c7aDwqWJQZ https://t.co/oi2GcFiLOr

Social distancing is the best way to prevent further spread of #COVID19. @CDC suggests:  🔹Maintaining a distance between yourself and others  🔹Avoid hugging and shaking hands 🔹Avoid large crowds and gatherings  🔹Stay home if you are sick https://t.co/uDpCZX2BU0
This morning at @HHSGov my @WaysandMeansGOP colleagues and I heard from @SecAzar on the steps being taken by @realDonaldTrump and @VP to prevent the spread of #coronavirus. https://t.co/6ZM127gqHq

.@MUSCTelehealth is offering a free urgent virtual care platform for people in South Carolina experiencing mild to moderate flu like symptoms.   To log on visit: https://t.co/kJdlqMusV2  Enter code: COVID19
The House just passed $7.8 billion for emergency #Coronavirus spending.   I’m happy that Democrats finally put the partisan politics aside so we could put the health and safety of Americans first.

I’m monitoring the spread of #COVID19 as it continues to make an impact. My colleagues and I will keep working to ensure the safety of all Americans.   For up-to-date information on Coronavirus visit https://t.co/Cl1lnfi6Vf https://t.co/xfZMafS9QZ
